org.transitime.db.structs

Class Calendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.Calendar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Immutable
 @Entity
public class Calendar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains data from the calendar.txt GTFS file. This class is for reading/writing that data to the db.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getCalendars

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Calendar> getCalendars(java.lang.String dbName,
                                                                    int configRev)
                                                             throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
        Opens up a new db session and returns Map of Calendar objects for the specified database revision. The map is keyed on the serviceId.
        Parameters:
        dbName - Specified name of database
        configRev -
        Returns:
        Map of Calendar objects keyed on serviceId
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException

      • getEndDate

        public java.util.Date getEndDate()
        End of the last day of service. This means that when an end date is specified the service runs for up to and including that day. Since days start at midnight, this method returns the endDate plus 1 day so that it represents midnight of the configured endDate.
        Returns:
        midnight at the end of the endDate

      • getEndDateStr

        public java.lang.String getEndDateStr()
        Returns:
        the end date as a formatted string
